DarkMouse::

"Killfest, Drillbit, Intruder on your level. Get him!"
She armed the autoguns and set them to fire on unauthorized bot 
signatures. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest's hand snaps to his gun as the alarms ring. He hears 
> DrillBit ask Darkmouse what was going on, and waits for the answer.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > "An Alliance, great. We'll talk about this in the conferance 
room."
> > He then saw Killfest walk up. He was about to say something to 
him 
> when
> > the alarms went off, and Ram-Jet asked why. He opened a comm.
> > "Dark Mouse, whats with the alarms?"
> > He kept looking at Ram-Jet. He had heard that name in his history 
> tapes.
> > Could this be one of the 'seeker' Decepticons?
